name: LoveBug
description: Sleepless nights. Blood, sweat and coffee. Survive your first game jam while developing a game in just under a weekend and maybe, just maybe, in the end of this all, you will find true love!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP or newer Processor: 1Ghz or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics or similar DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: The game is light and will run on most modern computers
